summary: This bill, S. 2970, introduced in the U.S. Senate, aims to authorize the use of off-highway vehicles (OHVs) on specified roads within Capitol Reef National Park in Utah. The bill defines "covered roads," referencing specific routes within the park. It states that OHV use on these roads will be governed by Utah state law. The bill's intent is to open certain areas of the park for OHV usage.
